name: ⎧ Suit of Wands ⎧
description: The Suit of Wands, sometimes called Rods, Staves, Sticks, Clubs, or Acorns, is the suit best represented by Elemental Fire, whose symbol is ∆.$(br)  As such, it is the suit related to inspiration, creativity, intuition, ambition, sacrifice, originality, focus, will, and the spirit.$(br)  The Wand of the Magician is the Power to Will.
